question: which of the following four is an attribute of a liquid fund ?
options: a fund which invests only in overnight debt securities
a mutual fund investing in short-term debt of less than 91 days maturity
a debt fund with an average maturity of 30 days
a fund which invests a minimum 50% of its funds in liquid assets
answer: a mutual fund investing in short-term debt of less than 91 days maturity
